info.join: For more information, or to join CFUW/Saskatoon Inc., please contact the following:
info.mailingAddress: CFUW Saskatoon Inc., P.O. Box 7405, Saskatoon, SK. S7K 4J3
info.general: General Meetings are held the first Monday of the Month at 7:30 p.m. at the W.A. Edwards Family Centre, 333 Fourth Avenue North, Saskatoon. Visitors are welcome. Annual membership fees are $80.00
